channel.title: [rs377d]#377 Subsonic
channel.description:
[img]http://img683.imageshack.us/img683/1354/subsonic.png[/img]
Since I see no-one using or making something based off rs377d, I'm starting a project called "Subsonic #377". I'm not going to perfection, I'm not making a RS remake, I'll try to attempt to finish all my goals, and then I'll release it so someone from the community might find it useful. There's a login packet with RSA encryption, the same as RuneScape uses. Also, the rs377d has already added a fullscreen interface packet, so yeah, there's a working sexy Welcome Screen.
I seriously hope:
[ul][li]That alot of people are going to use this when it's finished, PLEASE LEECH THIS instead of using some gay servers.[/li] [li]Advance 377's[/li] [li]That some people are going to realize why a rs377d is way better then an PI or Delta.[/li] [li]That I'm going to do something great out of this.[/li][/ul] Thanks to Scully, he helped me a lot.
[hr] Some features:
[ul][li]Login Screen(Welcome Screen)[/li] [li]Skills [/li] [li]NPC Dialogues[/li] [li]Arrow Hints[/li] [li]Object Arrow Hints[/li] [li]Logout - Thanks Scully![/li] [li]Command handling system[/li] [li]XP skills[/li] [li]Action button handling[/li] [li]Animations[/li] [li]Graphic system[/li][/ul] So, why did I actually release this if it was my project? Well I'm working on other stuff atm, and I'm thinking about to work on a NIO framework from scratch, or even to work on my own base.
[hr] [b][i]Some media:[/i][/b]
Anims [img]http://img32.imageshack.us/img32/6702/animz.png[/img]
Login Screen [img]http://img189.imageshack.us/img189/6348/loginscreenp.png[/img]
Login, skill tabs with set skilling added [img]http://img94.imageshack.us/img94/7968/aftersetskilling.png[/img]
[hr] Server: [url=http://uppit.com/tsveev97o7gy/rs377d.rar]Download[/url] [hr] Client: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=6NU1BRMU]Download[/url] [hr]
You need an IDE to run this though. [hr] [b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Blakeman8192[/b][/li] [li][b]I Roll Deep[/b][/li] [li][b]Scully [/b][/li] [li][b]Ecstasy[/b][/li][/ul]

item.title: [rs377d]#377 Subsonic
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

Wintercanon:

Blake is actually somewhat embarrassed by his programming in this (it’s a nice framework nonetheless). But yeah Blake is responsible for a lot of frameworks - not just RuneSource. Some to mention are: this, RuneSource, a bunch of semi-complete NIO bases, OpenRune, Osiris and Gatland.

He also had some good additions to hyperion.
